verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> you the Lord <S%H3050><s%>. Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, O my soul <S%H5315><s%>.
While I live <S%H2416><s%> will I praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: I will sing praises <S%H2167><s%> unto my God while I have any being <S%H430><s%>.
Put not your trust <S%H982><s%> in princes <S%H5081><s%>, nor in the son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, in whom there is no help <S%H8668><s%>.
His breath <S%H7307><s%> goes forth <S%H3318><s%>, he returns <S%H7725><s%> to his earth <S%H127><s%>; in that very day <S%H3117><s%> his thoughts <S%H6250><s%> perish <S%H6><s%>.
Happy <S%H835><s%> is he that has the God <S%H410><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> for his help <S%H5828><s%>, whose hope <S%H7664><s%> is in the Lord <S%H3068><s%> his God <S%H430><s%>:
Which made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and earth <S%H776><s%>, the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and all that in it is <S%H8104><s%>: which keeps truth <S%H571><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>:

Which executes <S%H6213><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> for the oppressed <S%H6231><s%>: which gives <S%H5414><s%> food <S%H3899><s%> to the hungry <S%H7457><s%>. The Lord <S%H3068><s%> loosens <S%H5425><s%> the prisoners <S%H631><s%>:

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> opens <S%H6491><s%> the eyes of the blind <S%H5787><s%>: the Lord <S%H3068><s%> raises <S%H2210><s%> them that are bowed down <S%H3721><s%>: the Lord <S%H3068><s%> loves <S%H157><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%>:

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> preserves <S%H8104><s%> the strangers <S%H1616><s%>; he relieves <S%H5749><s%> the fatherless <S%H3490><s%> and widow <S%H490><s%>: but the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> he turns upside down <S%H5791><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall reign <S%H4427><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>, even your God <S%H430><s%>, O Zion <S%H6726><s%>, unto all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>. Praise <S%H1984><s%> you the Lord <S%H3050><s%>.
